channel.title: Comments on: Why you should spend money on travel rather than things

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/why-you-should-spend-money-on-travel-rather-than-things/#comment-211045">Katarina</a>.
Thanks! I've been bad about updating the blog regularly. If you're on Instagram I post more photos there (my name is @travellingduff).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Katarina.

Thanks! I’ve been bad about updating the blog regularly. If you’re on Instagram I post more photos there (my name is @travellingduff).

item.title: By: Katarina
item.dc:creator: Katarina
item.description: I'm glad to see you blogging regularly again! I started to miss seeing your amazing pictures.
item.content:encoded: I’m glad to see you blogging regularly again! I started to miss seeing your amazing pictures.
